result.name: benefit-sanction-regime-data-for-jobseekers-allowance-and-employment-support-allowance
result.notes:
The data set consists of number of sanction decisions made for Jobseekers Allowance (JSA) and Employment Support Allowance(ESA) sanctions, including whether the decision was adverse or not.  The statistics will apply for the new sanctions regime introduced at the end of 2012. Data covers: Jobcentre Plus group / district / office; Local Authority and Parliamentary Constituency
https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/jobseekers-allowance-sanctions

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Benefit sanction regime data for Jobseekers Allowance and Employment Support Allowance
